attributes.action: Impose Sanctions on Banks and Financial Services Supporting Israeli Colonisation
attributes.additional_details:
Considering the huge amount of Israeli government expenditure on subsidizing settlement expansion and industry, their over-inflated military budget, it is not difficult to see how bond issuance aids the
occupation. These organizations provide mortgages and building projects for settlements, support authorities and businesses directly promoting apartheid in Palestine.
Government should inform customers of these services in the UK of their associations to allow them their explicit right to boycott
attributes.background: Withdrawing support from these complicit Israeli institutions. Urge local councils, investors, and universities to withdraw investments from them. Fulfill your legal obligations to this by not assisting their maintenance: ban business with Israeli settlements, fine and sanction these organizations
